items.sentence: He risked his whole fortune to discover new oil fields.
He is studying English, but he is also studying German.
He is sure to pass the exam if he studies at this rate.
How many countries have French as an official language?
What does your husband do, if you don't mind me asking?
An opportunity like this doesn't come around every day.
That's a question that nobody has ever asked me before.
Tom told me he thinks Mary is much prettier than Alice.
Tom said that he didn't know why Mary didn't like John.
I thought that Tom would give Mary John's phone number.
